about.description:
pyFAI is an azimuthal integration library that tries to be fast (as fast
as C and even more using OpenCL and GPU). It is based on histogramming of
the 2theta/Q positions of each (center of) pixel weighted by the intensity
of each pixel, but parallel version uses a SparseMatrix-DenseVector
multiplication. Neighboring output bins get also a contribution of pixels
next to the border thanks to pixel splitting. Finally pyFAI provides also
tools to calibrate the experimental setup using Debye-Scherrer rings of a
reference compound.
about.summary: Python implementation of fast azimuthal integration

name: pyfai
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: pyfai
    version: 0.19.0
source:
    sha256: 4dcbc92470997b5002d5626da4df428ab12efcfcec437d4cb001f41141665774
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/p/pyFAI/pyFAI-0.19.0.tar.gz
build:
    noarch: generic
    number: 2
    string: hd8ed1ab_2
requirements:
    build: []
    run:
        - hdf5plugin
        - matplotlib
        - pyfai-base >=0.19.0,<0.19.1.0a0
        - silx
test:
    imports:
        - pyFAI
        - pyFAI.gui
        - pyFAI.test
        - pyFAI.third_party
about:
    description: 'pyFAI is an azimuthal integration library that tries to be fast
        (as fast

        as C and even more using OpenCL and GPU). It is based on histogramming of

        the 2theta/Q positions of each (center of) pixel weighted by the intensity

        of each pixel, but parallel version uses a SparseMatrix-DenseVector

        multiplication. Neighboring output bins get also a contribution of pixels

        next to the border thanks to pixel splitting. Finally pyFAI provides also

        tools to calibrate the experimental setup using Debye-Scherrer rings of a

        reference compound.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/silx-kit/pyFAI/
    doc_url: http://www.silx.org/doc/pyFAI/latest/
    home: https://github.com/silx-kit/pyFAI/
    license: MIT
    license_family: MIT
    license_file: copyright
    summary: Python implementation of fast azimuthal integration
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - CJ-Wright
        - chiahaoliu
        - kif
        - t20100
        - tacaswell
        - tschoonj
